code: /** @format */import React,{useState}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{activateForm,activateUrl,deactivateUrl}from"../../slices/form.slice";import{DropdownButton,Dropdown}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CreateButton=function CreateButton(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DropdownButton,{variant:"primary",id:"dropdown-basic-button",title:"Create Recipe",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(activateForm());dispatch(activateUrl());},children:"allrecipes.com"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(activateForm());dispatch(deactivateUrl());},children:"from scratch"})]});};export default CreateButton;
